snippet: In Union City, N.J., people huddled in small groups, sharing the news about Cuba on street corners, smiling and patting each other on the shoulder.
abstract: In Union City, N.J., people huddled in small groups, sharing the news about Cuba on street corners, smiling and patting each other on the shoulder.

headline.main: In Union City, N.J.: 'Did You Hear?'
